text: @narendramodi We will have to live with Covid19 until vaccine is devloped. Goverment should bring noramlacy in the aviation sector with guidelines to protect ourselves from corona with activities to strengthen economy.#resumedomesticflights @MoCA_GoI @HardeepSPuri @AmitShah @nitin_gadkari
